{"step_by_step_thinking": "Intraocular metastasis refers to the spread of cancer from another part of the body to the eye. To determine the most common site of primary for intraocular metastasis, we need to consider the primary sites that are known to commonly metastasize to the eye. Among the given options, breast cancer is the most common primary site for intraocular metastasis. Breast cancer has a tendency to spread to various distant sites, including the eye. Therefore, the answer is A. Breast.", "answer_choice": "A"}
